long_description: Full-stack developer crafting innovative web and mobile solutions. Passionate about building user-centric software that solves real problems and makes a meaningful impact
project_1_description: A comprehensive system for managing restaurant operations, including order processing, inventory management, and customer relationship management.
project_1_technologies: Technologies used: ejs, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, User Session,Tailwind CSS
project_2_title: Attendance Taking System powered by AI
project_2_description: An AI-powered desktop application that automates the process of taking attendance using computer vision, reducing manual effort and improving accuracy.
project_2_technologies: Technologies used: React, python, FastAPI, SQLite, Tailwind CSS, OpenCV, deepFace, material UI, electron.js
project_3_description: A blogging platform for university students with extremely customizable and user-friendly features.
project_3_technologies: Technologies used: React, Node.js, Express, mySQL, Tailwind CSS, sequelize, fireBase, JWT, bcrypt
experience_1_description: As a Senior Software Engineer at Google, I played a pivotal role in developing innovative solutions for Google's core search algorithms. Collaborating with a dynamic team of engineers, I contributed to the enhancement of search accuracy and efficiency, optimizing user experiences for millions of users worldwide.

testimonial_1_description: Working with you was a fantastic experience. Your attention to detail and commitment to delivering high-quality solutions exceeded our expectations.
